001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.io.CharStreams;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.*;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
006import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
007import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
008
009import java.io.*;
010import java.nio.file.FileVisitResult;
011import java.nio.file.Files;
012import java.nio.file.Path;
013import java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor;
014import java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes;
015import java.time.LocalDateTime;
016import java.util.Arrays;
017import java.util.stream.Collectors;
018
019import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student.Section.GRADUATE;
020import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE;
021import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.SummaryReport.GRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME;
022import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.SummaryReport.UNDERGRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME;
023import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
024import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
025
026public class SummaryReportTest {
027
028  private File tempDirectory;
029
030  @BeforeEach
031  public void createTempDirectoryForTest() {
032    String tempDirName = "SummaryReportTestTempDirectory-" + System.currentTimeMillis();
033    tempDirectory = new File(System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir"), tempDirName);
034    System.out.println("Temp dir is " + tempDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
035
036    boolean dirWasCreated = tempDirectory.mkdirs();
037    assertThat(dirWasCreated, equalTo(true));
038  }
039
040  @AfterEach
041  public void deleteTempDirectoryForTest() throws IOException {
042    Files.walkFileTree(tempDirectory.toPath(), new SimpleFileVisitor<Path>() {
043      @Override
044      public FileVisitResult visitFile(Path file, BasicFileAttributes attrs) throws IOException {
045        return deleteFile(file);
046      }
047
048      @Override
049      public FileVisitResult postVisitDirectory(Path dir, IOException exc) throws IOException {
050        return deleteFile(dir);
051      }
052
053      private FileVisitResult deleteFile(Path file) throws IOException {
054        Files.delete(file);
055        return FileVisitResult.CONTINUE;
056      }
057    });
058
059    assertThat(tempDirectory.exists(), equalTo(false));
060  }
061
062  @Test
063  public void ungradedAssignmentsDoNotCountTowardsGraded() {
064    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
065    Student student = new Student("student");
066    gradeBook.addStudent(student);
067    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 4.0);
068    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
069
070    Grade grade = new Grade(assignment, Grade.NO_GRADE);
071    student.setGrade(assignment.getName(), grade);
072
073    assertThat(SummaryReport.noStudentHasGradeFor(assignment, gradeBook), equalTo(true));
074
075  }
076
077  @Test
078  public void reportsAreGeneratedInCorrectDirectories() throws IOException {
079    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
080    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 4.0);
081    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
082
083    double undergradScore = 3.0;
084    Student undergrad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, "undergrad", UNDERGRADUATE, undergradScore);
085
086    double gradScore = 3.5;
087    Student grad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, "grad", GRADUATE, gradScore);
088
089    SummaryReport.dumpReports(gradeBook.getStudentIds(), gradeBook, tempDirectory, false);
090
091    assertThatStudentHasReportInDirectoryWithScore(undergrad, UNDERGRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME, undergradScore);
092    assertThatStudentHasReportInDirectoryWithScore(grad, GRADUATE_DIRECTORY_NAME, gradScore);
093  }
094
095  private Student addStudentInSectionWithScore(GradeBook gradeBook, Assignment assignment, String studentId, Student.Section enrolledSection, double undergradScore) {
096    Student undergrad = new Student(studentId);
097    undergrad.setEnrolledSection(enrolledSection);
098    gradeBook.addStudent(undergrad);
099    undergrad.setGrade(assignment, undergradScore);
100    return undergrad;
101  }
102
103  private void assertThatStudentHasReportInDirectoryWithScore(Student student, String dirFileName, double studentScore) throws IOException {
104    File directory = new File(tempDirectory, dirFileName);
105    assertThat(directory.exists(), equalTo(true));
106
107    File reportFile = new File(directory, SummaryReport.getReportFileName(student.getId()));
108    assertThat(reportFile.exists(), equalTo(true));
109
110    String reportContents = readTextFromFile(reportFile);
111    assertThat(reportContents, containsString(String.valueOf(studentScore)));
112  }
113
114  private String readTextFromFile(File file) throws IOException {
115    StringWriter writer = new StringWriter();
116    CharStreams.copy(new FileReader(file), writer);
117    return writer.getBuffer().toString();
118  }
119
120  @Test
121  public void totalsArePrintedForAllStudents() {
122    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
123    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 4.0);
124    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
125
126    String worseUndergradStudentName = "worseUndergrad";
127    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, worseUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 3.0);
128
129    String betterUndergradStudentName = "betterUndergrad";
130    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, betterUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 3.5);
131
132    String worseGradStudentName = "worseGrad";
133    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, worseGradStudentName, GRADUATE, 3.0);
134
135    String betterGradStudentName = "betterGrad";
136    addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, betterGradStudentName, GRADUATE, 3.5);
137
138    calculateTotalGradesForStudents(gradeBook, false);
139
140    CapturingPrintWriter out = new CapturingPrintWriter();
141    SummaryReport.printOutStudentTotals(gradeBook.studentsStream().collect(Collectors.toSet()), out);
142
143    String written = out.getTextWrittenToWriter();
144    String[] strings = { betterUndergradStudentName, worseUndergradStudentName, betterGradStudentName, worseGradStudentName };
145    assertThat(written, stringContainsInOrder(Arrays.asList(strings)));
146  }
147
148  private void calculateTotalGradesForStudents(GradeBook gradeBook, boolean assignLetterGrades) {
149    PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(new Writer() {
150      @Override
151      public void write(char[] cbuf, int off, int len) throws IOException {
152
153      }
154
155      @Override
156      public void flush() throws IOException {
157
158      }
159
160      @Override
161      public void close() throws IOException {
162
163      }
164    });
165
166    gradeBook.studentsStream().forEach(student -> {
167      SummaryReport.dumpReportTo(gradeBook, student, pw, assignLetterGrades);
168    });
169  }
170
171  private class CapturingPrintWriter extends PrintWriter {
172    public CapturingPrintWriter() {
173      super(new StringWriter());
174    }
175
176    public String getTextWrittenToWriter() {
177      return ((StringWriter) this.out).getBuffer().toString();
178    }
179  }
180
181  @Test
182  public void assignLetterGradesAccordingToGradeBookRangesForSection() {
183    GradeBook gradeBook = new GradeBook("test");
184    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("assignment", 10.0);
185    gradeBook.addAssignment(assignment);
186
187    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges undergradLetterGradeRanges = gradeBook.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE);
188    undergradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A).setRange(95, 100);
189    undergradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A_MINUS).setRange(90, 94);
190    undergradLetterGradeRanges.validate();
191
192    GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges gradLetterGradeRanges = gradeBook.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.GRADUATE);
193    gradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A).setRange(92, 100);
194    gradLetterGradeRanges.getRange(LetterGrade.A_MINUS).setRange(90, 91);
195    gradLetterGradeRanges.validate();
196
197    String betterUndergradStudentName = "betterUndergrad";
198    Student betterUndergrad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, betterUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 9.7);
199    assertThat(betterUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), nullValue());
200
201    String worseUndergradStudentName = "worseUndergrad";
202    Student worseUndergrad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, worseUndergradStudentName, UNDERGRADUATE, 9.2);
203    assertThat(worseUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), nullValue());
204
205    String gradStudentName = "grad";
206    Student grad = addStudentInSectionWithScore(gradeBook, assignment, gradStudentName, GRADUATE, 9.2);
207    assertThat(grad.getLetterGrade(), nullValue());
208
209    calculateTotalGradesForStudents(gradeBook, true);
210
211    assertThat(betterUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), equalTo(LetterGrade.A));
212    assertThat(worseUndergrad.getLetterGrade(), equalTo(LetterGrade.A_MINUS));
213    assertThat(grad.getLetterGrade(), equalTo(LetterGrade.A));
214  }
215
216  @Test
217  public void assignmentDueInThePastIsLate() {
218    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("Test", 4.0);
219    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now().minusDays(3);
220    assignment.setDueDate(dueDate);
221
222    assertThat(SummaryReport.dueDateHasPassed(assignment), equalTo(true));
223  }
224
225  @Test
226  public void assignmentDueInTheFutureIsNotLate() {
227    Assignment assignment = new Assignment("Test", 4.0);
228    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now().plusDays(3);
229    assignment.setDueDate(dueDate);
230
231    assertThat(SummaryReport.dueDateHasPassed(assignment), equalTo(false));
232  }
233
234}
